title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Tampa Bay's Mike Evans on Tom Brady's return, Bucs vs Cowboys, his Harry Potter tattoo
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Tampa Bay's Mike Evans on Tom Brady's return, Bucs vs Cowboys, his Harry Potter tattoo
description:
Tampa Bay Buccaneers' WR Mike Evans joins The Richard Sherman Podcast to discuss Tom Brady coming back for another year and what he thought about Tom's recent hiatus. Mike talks about how the Bucs will fare this season with Todd Bowles as Head Coach instead of Bruce Arians and what he is looking forward to in their Week 1 matchup vs the Dallas Cowboys. Mike and Richard have a great debate about which position is harder to play between wide receiver or cornerback. Lastly Mike discusses his interests off the football field, like his love for Harry Potter, why Fortnite is his game of choice, and his favorite NBA 2K builds. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
